paths.description: A string or an array of paths to watch. Supports globbing.

root.description: The root path from which all other paths will be resolved.

ignored.description: Paths, globs or regular expressions to ignore.

exec.description: The command to execute on file change.

port.description: The port on which the server should run. This is passed to your application as `process.env.PORT` which should be used by you.

logLevel.description: The level of logging. 0 - fatal, 1 - error, 2 - warning, 3 - info, 4 - debug

buffer.description: The buffer duration to wait before triggering a restart.

bufferPoll.description: The buffer polling interval to check for the file stability.

display.description: The various messages to display during different events.

onBeforeStart.description: The message to display before the watcher starts.

onStart.description: The message to display after the watcher starts.

onBeforeRestart.description: The message to display before the watcher restarts.

onRestart.description: The message to display after the watcher restarts.

onBeforeStop.description: The message to display before the watcher stops.

clearScreen.description: Clear the screen on start and on every restart.

env.description: A set of key-value pairs which will be promptly passed on to your process and accessible via `process.env`.
